Detailed Description

A journal.

Member Function Documentation

Journal::Exists (  ) 

Test whether this object already exists.

First test is whether this ISSN is in the database. If we don't have an ISSN, use the journal title.

Returns:
True if object exists in database, false otherwise

Reimplemented from Object.

Journal::GenerateObjectId (  ) 

Generate object identifier.

Generate md5 hash of ISSN, if available, otherwise hash journal name

Reimplemented from Object.

Post process.

Journal::StoreGuids ( $  author_id,
$  ip,
$  comment 
)

Store journal GUIDs in EAV database.

Default GUID is ISSN

Parameters:
author_id Unique identifier for author or agent storing the object
ip IP address of author or agent storing the object
comment Comment describing the edit
